allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Patent disclosure documents - Priority date 2026-01-02

CONFIDENTIAL - Invention Disclosure Documents

Inventor: Bojan Janjatović
Witness: Marija Janjatović
Date of Conception: 2026-01-02

Concepts disclosed:
- EK-2026-001: Unified Modular Power Architecture
- EK-2026-002: Dual-Purpose Robotic Swap Station
- EK-2026-003: Distributed Power Sparing System
- EK-2026-004: Fleet-Integrated Maintenance Logistics

This commit establishes priority date for patent purposes.
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
NEW PATENT: EK-2026-005 Coordinated Dual-Robot System

Key innovation: Custom robots, NOT off-the-shelf UR/KUKA

- Robot A: Vehicle-mounted \(on bus\)
- Robot B: Station-based  
- Coordinated operation
- Self-healing infrastructure
- Bus arrives + charging fails → robots fix it automatically

Inventor: Bojan Janjatović
Date: 2026-01-02
EOF
\)")
